properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 2:41PM AKST until February 7 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected, with up to 4 inches accumulation.

* WHERE...North of the Chatanika River

* WHEN...Midnight tonight until midnight Thursday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop about midnight
tonight and continue through Thursday night. Up to 4 inches of
snow is expected north of the Chatanika river. South of the
Chatanika River, including Fairbanks, snow amounts are expected
to be less than 2 inches.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be
obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT AKST THURSDAY NIGHT
